Node.definition: = action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= conditions and circumstances that have qualities that inspire appreciation
= songs in which action humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= person or animal that has been caused to leave their place or position by force

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or objects to come together in one location

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to wrap|to bandage|to tie|to bind up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans wrap something around an inanimate object
= a physical or emotional state of discomfort or anguish
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events

= celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: there is no counting (of it); hence: = state in which events cannot be counted or measured because of their frequency or intensity
= action by which a person is surrounded ► in order to support or to give relief

= state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans produce musical sounds with their voice, often as a celebratory response, either set to a prescribed tune or spontaneous
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: confession; hence: = action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
= causative action by which humans or deities cover a surface with their hands, a piece of cloth, a substance, or an object, ► often with the purpose of making this surface invisible or inaccessible
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
literally: to establish; hence: = causative action by which deities and humans take all the steps that are needed for an event to take place

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive

Node.gloss: to cause to sprout|to make come up|to cause to bring forth
Node.definition: = causative process by which a deity or the earth causes plants or horns to come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= type of grass; ◄ plants; ► serves as food for animals; ≈ regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short lived
often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to humans (אָדָם) birds (עֹוף) reptiles (רֶמֶשׂ) insects (שֶׁרֶץ) and fish (דָּג)
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= a large black bird with a thick strong beak, and fairly short legs; it is highly intelligent and seems to enjoy flying; it eats almost anything, including grain, fruit, insects, lizards, frogs, eggs, nestlings, and the meat of dead animals; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ its black color is regarded as beautiful
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= the upper part of the leg of humans and animals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans experience fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to strengthen|to give strength, to fortify|to repair|to let prevail
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans and objects to be strong in a physical, political, or military sense
a long rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material, attached in horizontal position to a gate so that it cannot be opened from the outside

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= pertaining to being the best part of an object or the best among a range of objects
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= causative process by which humans or deities cause the desire of (other) humans to be fulfilled

Node.gloss: to send|to cause to happen|to stir up
Node.definition: literally: to send; hence: = causative action by which deities cause an event to happen
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
particle marking a phrase indicating that an event is taking place at a relatively fast speed; = marker emphasizing the relatively high speed of an event
= process by which an event happens without delay

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
= soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep, ► used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; ≈ associated with whiteness, purity, and softness
= frozen water vapor deposited on vegetation and other surfaces when the weather is clear and still

= powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well
= pellets of ice that fall from the sky as precipitation
= a relatively small quantity of food
= referring to a state of low temperature

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to send|to cause to happen|to stir up
Node.definition: literally: to send; hence: = causative action by which deities cause an event to happen
= causative process by which deities cause frozen water to become liquid
= causative action by which deities cause air to move across a surface or against an object

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
